title: How to create a task?
description: To create a task, click on the 'Add Task' button and fill in the required details.

title: How to delete a task?
description: To delete a task, click on the 'Delete' button next to the task you want to remove.

title: How to edit a task?
description: To edit a task, click on the 'Edit' button next to the task you want to modify.
